story_25_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: So now we’ve scraped by through round four.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Man, every time we take a step forward, we
bump into a stronger team than the last. Wonder
what we’re in for in the next round.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
The quarterfinals are what we’re in for, Brock!
Which means we’ve got to go in pumped up and
ready to fight!
story_25_04000/2401_0301_0500_10:
We’re gonna fight our way through to
the finals!
story_25_04000/2401_0401_0600_10:
You said it! See, Brock? That’s the kind of energy
we’re gonna need!
story_25_04000/2401_0401_0700_10:
Haha! All right, point taken. I’m gonna turn it up
even higher than before!
story_25_04000/2401_0401_0800_10:
That’s what I like to hear. C’mon, I think they
might have posted the matchups for the next
round. Let’s go check!
story_25_04000/2401_0302_1000_10: That battle really wore me out...
story_25_04000/2401_0402_1100_10:
Aw, come on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Not you, too!
story_25_04000/2401_0402_1200_10:
Well, let’s at least go see if they’ve posted the
matchups for the next round before we all take a
break, all right?
story_25_04000/2401_0402_1300_10:
Good call. The sooner we know who we’re up
against, the better.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_1500_10: Is that who I think it is?
story_25_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Congratulations! That was quite a battle you
all fought.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_1800_10:
It looks like you all have gotten even better since
last time.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Thank you very much. That’s why we can’t afford
to coast right now.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_2000_10:
The further we get in this tournament, the more
these battles take everything we’ve got to win.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Would you like to come with us to check the
quarterfinal matchups, Cynthia?
story_25_04000/2401_1001_2200_10: Yeah, we’re just about to head over.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_2300_10: Oh! You mean you haven’t seen yet?
story_25_04000/2401_1001_2400_10: Then I think I can save you the trouble.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_2600_10: I already know who you’ll be up against.
story_25_04000/2401_1001_2700_10: I hope you’ll give us a good fight.
